author: Filippo MONTEFORTE
title: A nun stands in St Peter's Square as Pope Francis is hospitalised for bronchitis and missed his weekly Angelus prayer | National | inforney.com
text:
A nun stands in St Peter's Square as Pope Francis is hospitalised for bronchitis and missed his weekly Angelus prayer
- Filippo MONTEFORTE
- Updated
0
As featured on
Pope Francis followed Sunday mass and his traditional Angelus weekly prayer on television in a Rome hospital where the 88-year-old pontiff is being treated for bronchitis.
